text: Allan Huber "Bud" Selig (born July 30, 1934) is an American baseball executive. He currently serves as the Commissioner Emeritus of Baseball. Before, he served as the ninth Commissioner of Baseball. He initially served as the acting commissioner beginning in 1992 before being named the official commissioner in 1998. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Milwaukee Category:Major League Baseball commissioners
title: Bud Selig
